name: ASTRAL GATE
description:
Astral Gate is a non-field/command RPG with an emphasis on combat.

Attention!
This product is Japanese version, please be careful when you purchase.

Command RPG Battle Test

The first time you play the game, you can play it as a "Command RPG Battle Test".

Form a 4-person party from 9 unique characters,
With limited resources, challenge the dungeon with a total of 7 stages.
Your combat skills are measured by the progress of your party until they are all killed, and by the content of the previous battles.

The dungeon progresses through repeated battles with enemies of boss strength.
You can refer to the status and action patterns of enemies appearing in each stage in advance,
Even if it is your first time playing, you can break through depending on your strategy.

The time required for one play is about 1.5 to 3.5 hours.
It is extremely difficult to clear all stages on the first playthrough, but we encourage you to aim for it.

Second and subsequent plays

If your party is wiped out, you will restart from the party formation.
Stage clear status and equipment will not be carried over.

However, there is no randomness in the types of enemies that appear in each stage and their rewards in this title.
Please build up a strategy pattern based on the knowledge and experience you have gained through previous play and aim to clear all stages.

Depending on how the game progresses, route branches may occur and powerful enemies may appear.
There are three types of branches. Try to conquer them all.

The total game play time is about 15-25 hours.

Story

The ruins are located in a forest on the western edge of the continent.
　There lies a hidden treasure that can grant any wish."

Hearing this rumor, the four heroes came to the ruins,
They meet Alicia, a woman who claims to be a researcher of the ruins.

What is the purpose of Alicia's guiding them to the ruins?
What is the secret of the hidden treasure in the ruins? ......

Stories can be skipped even if you have not read them.
Even if you skip the story, all routes can be completed.
